title: Comparing Development Models
bullets: Why: Efficient when the destination is known and the route is stable. Optimized for batching and predictability.
Why: Necessary when terrain is uncertain. Small, autonomous units that can re-route instantly based on feedback.
notes: Dark navy gradient background. Large white title top-left with a thin horizontal divider line beneath spanning most of slide. Two side-by-side rounded 'cards' with subtle shadow and thin border: left and right. Each card has a wide photo on top and a dark text panel below. Left card section title in light gray; right card section title in cyan/teal. Body text white/light gray; 'Best For:' and 'Why:' labels bold.
